WorkItem.Description:
Title: [General] All items equiped overwrite head slot item.
Description: Rawr puts all items that are equiped via right click on item --> equip to the head slot regardless what slot the item is.
Steps to Reproduce:
 
   1. Launch Rawr
   2. Load Any character (Zatlin, Draenor)
   3. Select Gear - > Belt
   4. Select Verdigris Chain Belt [264]
   5. Right click on belt ---> Equip
   6. I now have a belt icon in my head slot.
 
Additional Information:
 
    * Rawr b3.0.3.22
    * Windows 7 Home Preimum
    * Silverlight 4.0
 
Attachments:
 
    * Zatlin-Prot.xml
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Equipping any item goes into Head slot
